name: DIY Deer Decorations
description:
A collaboration with under graduate Stuart Featherstone

DIY Deer Decoration is a small wooden deer grazing the land to gather food across your mantlepiece. 

This little stocking filler is a great way for young creatives who pay attention to detail. The deer has been purposely design with rough edges and some sand paper to allow you to sand the products to your desired quality. 

More designs to come! So Start your collection now!

Materials: Laser Plywood 
Dimensions: 104mm x 148mm x 3mm

name: Lumiere
description:
Lumière, a tea light holder that is a great addition to any home.

Lumière is a stylish contemporary product with a hint of Gothic Chic. It is cut from clear acrylic and flat packed for cheaper and safer delivery. 

Don't fear having to put it together yourself, it's a product that is easy to assemble and comes with simple instructions, 2 tea lights and screws to attach it to the wall. All you need is the matches, you could even replace standard tea lights with scented ones!

Material: 3mm Laser Cut Clear Arcylic 
W.210mm x H.300mm x H.110mm

name: fiveAday
description:
‘fiveAday’: the brand new product range designed for all modern kitchen settings. JollySmith is proud to introduce the magnetic pin up board incorporating a 1mm laser cut mild steel, powder coated to enhance its looks and keep its durability. This exciting set consists of the nations 5 most popular fruits; Apples, Bananas, Oranges, Pears and Grapes. 

 ‘fiveAday’ is packaged in a recyclable slimline box, complete with 5 magnets, this is a must buy for any kitchen.

Material: Powder Coated Mild Steel
within a 300mm x 300mm x 12mm box
0.9mm thick steel

name: BRAND NEW Tea Towels
description:
Why not grab yourself some of our Brand new JollySmith Accent Tea Towels. With a growing range of accents across the country displayed on a tea towel for all ages to learn.

The current accents that have so far been created on the tea towels are Yorkshire, Cockney, Scouse and Geordie

So why not choose your Black or Red accent themed Tea Towel.
